sourcesContent:
import "./css/App.css"; const Resume = () => { return (
{/* Background Section */}

Larson Evans

Full-Stack Software Engineer

Passionate about building scalable, efficient, and user-friendly applications with expertise in front-end and back-end technologies.

{/* Mission Statement */}

Mission Statement

Experienced in developing high-quality software solutions, optimizing system performance, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive project success. Seeking opportunities to contribute to a dynamic, growth-oriented company as a full-stack developer.

{/* Education */}

Education

Mercer University

Bachelor's in Computer Science (Graduated May 2023)

Skills: C#, Java, JavaScript, Python, SQL, PL/SQL, HTML, CSS

Frameworks & Tools: React, Spring Boot, Selenium, PostgreSQL, Azure, Docker, Git

{/* Professional Summary */}

Professional Summary

Full-stack developer with experience in designing, developing, and maintaining web applications. Proficient in database management, UI/UX design, and optimizing system performance.

{/* Work Experience */}

Work Experience

{/* Mercer Engineering Research Center */}
Mercer Engineering Research Center - Software Developer

June 2023 – November 2024

  • Developed and optimized web applications using C#, SQL, PL/SQL, HTML, and Python.
  • Implemented workflows for managing critical safety items for the C-130 aircraft.
  • Enhanced AIRCAT’s DTADS DASHBOARD, improving data analysis capabilities.
  • Designed and containerized an AI model using Docker to improve system scalability.
{/* Warner Robins AFB */}
Warner Robins Air Force Base - Software Developer Intern

May 2021 – May 2023

  • Developed machine learning models for server crash prevention.
  • Enhanced PEER, a satellite analysis platform, by integrating a session chat service.
{/* STEM Teaching Volunteer */}
Mercer on Mission - STEM Teacher Volunteer

June 2022 - July 2022

  • Taught programming to students using Python, Jeroo, and Google Scripts.
{/* Projects */}

Projects

{/* Stock Predictor */}
Stock Price Prediction using LSTM

Spring 2023

  • Developed a neural network with TensorFlow to predict stock price movements.
  • Implemented moving averages and technical indicators, achieving 48% accuracy.
{/* Job Queue Simulation */}
Operating System Job Queue Simulation

Spring 2022

  • Simulated an OS job queue, tracking key performance metrics.
  • Implemented linked lists, pointers, and queue-based processing for optimization.
{/* Contact Section */}

Contact Me

Let's connect! Reach out to me via email or LinkedIn.

Email Me
); }; export default Resume;
